document_data.name: Uttermost North
document_data.mainbody: The '''Uttermost North''', also known as the '''Utter North''', was a freezing region of [[Toril]] that spanned across the northern-most regions of the continent of [[Faerûn]]. It was nearly entirely inhospitable, with only a scattering of [[humanoid]] societies and places of note.
document_data.Geography: From the perspective of the people of [[the North]], the Utter North comprised all the lands north of the [[Spine of the World]] mountains.
document_data.Geographic Features: The predominant feature of the Uttermost North was the vast frozen wasteland of the [[Endless Ice Sea]]. There were only a few scattered points of interest found throughout the region, and some of those only existed as mere rumor or legend.

Notable Locations.Landmarks: * [[Nchaser's Legacy]]: The monolithic tower of the famed 14{{th}}–century [[wizard]] was purported to rest on an impossibly-tall stalactite of ice located atop Toril's northern pole.
Notable Locations.Regions: * [[Valley of Khedrun]]: This local was named after a renowned [[dwarven]] hero.

document_data.Inhabitants: Among the arctic wildlife found throughout the Utter North were [[polar bear]]s.
